body: From what I know, Rifujin Shoujo is about a girl who suddenly got goddess powers and use them to make perv things like gender bendering other people and raping them, or in this case, transforming them in a skinsuit (and raping them too). Unfortunately, only a few of them were translated to english yet.
I want mikaduki nekos wirk translated more than any other artist on this site. Shame they dont draw more attention...
The thumbnail got me confused and so did the story.
I have a question or two regarding the story and overall quality of this book
